00049 typedef struct _nitf_Record
00050 {
00051     /* The file header */
00052     nitf_FileHeader *header;
00053 
00054     /* List of ImageSegments */
00055     nitf_List *images;
00056 
00057     /* List of GraphicsSegments */
00058     nitf_List *graphics;
00059 
00060     /* List of LabelSegments (2.0 only) */
00061     nitf_List *labels;
00062 
00063     /* List of TextSegments */
00064     nitf_List *texts;
00065 
00066     /* List of data extensions segments (DES) */
00067     nitf_List *dataExtensions;
00068 
00069     /* List of reserved segments (RES) */
00070     nitf_List *reservedExtensions;
00071 }
00072 nitf_Record;
00073 
00074 #define NITF_INVALID_NUM_SEGMENTS(I) ((I < 0) || (I > 999))
